channel.title: How so i fix this error when I try to log on
channel.description:
so when i try to log into rune scape sometimes, it says: Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape
To fix this try the following (in order):
1: try closing ALL open web-browser windows, and reloading 2:Try clearing your web-browsers cahche from tools->internet options 3:Try using a different game world 4:Try rebooting your computer 5:Try selecting a different version of Java from the play-game menu
and yes I have tried most of these except for: Try clearing your web-browsers cahche from tools->internet options, mainly because i have no idea what that means. Please post back any feedback will help me...unless you post spam.. ;D

item.title: How so i fix this error when I try to log on
item.dc:creator: @c4live c4live
item.description:
@c4live wrote:

…why would I be on a moparscape forum, asking about the real rs…I want to play moparscape but I cant because everytime i try to log in it comes up with that stupid error(look at the first post) so if any one could help me figure this out it would be very apprieciated!
